column1: The '''''Tolkien Calendar 2001''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[5 June]] [[2000]]. It features art by [[John Howe]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', and includes a free poster of the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields

column2:
The 21st century’s first Tolkien Calendar features twelve newly commissioned paintings based on The Lord of the Rings by renowned Tolkien artist John Howe.

The Tolkien Calendar 2001 features 13 brand new paintings from John Howe, creator of the famous ‘Gandalf’ jacket and designer on the forthcoming Lord of the Rings Movie Trilogy . The paintings are all based on Tolkien’s classic masterpiece, The Lord of the Rings and the overall design of this year’s calendar features input from the artist himself.}}
